issues.title: ZeroUp has some troubles in distributing big files.
issues.body: When I upload my file (a video) to the ZeroUp using one computer A, then I download it by another computer B. The .msgpack file of the video is hard (more than one day, then I give up) to download in the computer B, although the file can be found in the ZeroUp site using computer B. What is the problem?

issues.title: content.json is missing?
issues.body: When I create a new zite, and put the new content into the corresponding floder. Then I update the zite, the content.json is always missing. But the file content.json is indeed is the corresponding floder, and I donot delete it. Why it shows content.json is missing in the left side of zite when i update my zite?
